short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access a vast collection of manuals across various categories like mobile phones, printers, photo cameras, etc. with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access a vast collection of user guides across various categories like mobile phones, printers, photo cameras, etc. from the browser toolbar. Effortlessly search using the product or brand name and download them in PDF format for offline access.

How to use the extension:
- Search for any guide by brand or product.
- Click on the Manual you wish to read.  
- Save, Print, or Download them with a simple click!
